SQLCommands.sql_loginP: SELECT * FROM user_table WHERE phone =? AND password = ?
SQLCommands.sql_loginE: SELECT * FROM user_table WHERE email =? AND password = ?
SQLCommands.sql_forget_passwordP: UPDATE user_table SET password=? WHERE phone=?
SQLCommands.sql_forget_passwordE: UPDATE user_table SET password=? WHERE email=?
SQLCommands.sql_updateP: UPDATE user_table SET password=? WHERE phone=?
SQLCommands.sql_updateE: UPDATE user_table SET password=? WHERE email=?
SQLCommands.sql_query_daytask: SELECT * FROM day_plans WHERE uid = ? and ddate like ?
